injuries.name: Jamal Murray
injuries.description: Jan 3: Murray (ankle) is probable for Sunday's game against the Nets.

injuries.name: Christian Braun
injuries.description: Jan 3: Braun (ankle) is questionable for Sunday's game against the Nets.

injuries.name: Aaron Gordon
injuries.description: Jan 3: Gordon (hamstring) is questionable for Sunday's game against the Nets.

injuries.name: Jonas Valanciunas
injuries.description: Jan 1: Valanciunas will be re-evaluated in four weeks for a right calf strain that he suffered during the Nuggets' 106-103 win over the Raptors on Wednesday, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

injuries.name: Nikola Jokic
injuries.description: Dec 30: Jokic will miss at least four weeks with a hyperextended left knee, ESPN's Shams Charania reports.

injuries.name: Cameron Johnson
injuries.description: Dec 25: Johnson will be reevaluated in 4-to-6 weeks due to a right knee contusion, Shams Charania of ESPN reports.

injuries.name: Tamar Bates
injuries.description: Dec 22: The Nuggets announced Monday that Bates (foot) will be re-evaluated in 12 weeks.
